creator: Grood Grood
descriptionHtml:
💖 Camera for Galaxy Note 10 - HD Camera 4K with the new camera system brings professional film technology to mobile devices, so you can easily use it.

💛 Advanced camera system with professional technology has become more compact, allowing you to record video and edit right on the device. Camera for Galaxy Note 10 - HD Camera 4K giving the camera a new night mode, augmented reality features, and the ability to capture just the audio you want when recording a video.

💚 Super Anti-shake mode gives you the smoothest and most natural videos even in the most spectacular adventures. Shoot motion-proof motion videos for stable footage. The Camera for Galaxy Note 10 app has software that predicts motion from more than one million frames, minimizing vibration during recording.

💙 With Camera for Galaxy Note 10 - HD Camera 4K, the moment was recorded in detail to detail thanks to HDR10 + technology. Turn incredible movies from color to detail with 4K UHD. With excellent colors and contrast, HDR10 + and Dynamic Tone Mapping technology support every moment of life's lifelike life.

🍉 On the phone with full equipment like a complete movie studio.
Allows you to collage videos, insert transition effects or add subtitles, change video speed, and especially use the S Pen to decorate directly on videos. Using the S Pen of the Note 10, you can add your own personal artwork to the real world and capture it on video.

🍹 Bring great standard professional photos. Scene Optimization brings the most professionally animated photos. After just one touch, the Camera for Galaxy Note 10 - HD Camera 4K immediately identify the common subject and use Local Tone Mapping technology to automatically adjust the settings for each photo to be a shared masterpiece.

🍱 Features

❂ +100 wonderful filters and also have a filter store which has many advanced filters
❂ Note 10 Camera support live AR stickers, Emoji stickers
❂ Cool seal sticker and watermark
❂ Support UHD camera
❂ Support FHD video record
❂ Support HDR mode, help you take better photos
❂ Auto-focus or Touch to focus
❂ Auto flash on/off
❂ Professional mode: Scene modes, ISO, White balance, Exposure adjustment, and etc.
❂ Silent capture mode
❂ Note 10 Camera support take selfie handily by using volume key
❂ Note 10 Camera support burst shot and timer shot
❂ Fill light in front camera to take a better selfie
❂ Support resolution adjustment for Camera & Video
❂ Efficient album manage for your photos
❂ Default camera setting & reset
❂ Support Vignette function
❂ Support Tilt-shift photography
❂ Stamp photos with time and date tags
❂ White screen flash for the front camera
❂ Selfie mirror mode
❂ Add amazing filters to photos
❂ Note 10 photo editor support crop and rotate the photo, adjust photo size
❂ Note 10 photo editor supports many photo adjustments, such as contrast, saturation, brightness, tone, and etc.
❂ Doodle and text in Note 10 photo editor
❂ Config backgrounds, fonts and tags
❂ Adjust tilt-shift and vignette
❂ Adjust photo size
❂ Choose photo save format

🥗 The front camera upgrades selfie photos into portrait masterpieces. The front camera has been upgraded to be in low light with the camera placement optimized for the most natural eye view, the selfie is still impressive.

🍋 Dual aperture optimizes every light mode day or night. Wide Angle Camera automatically optimizes natural light: The F1.5 aperture delivers brighter picture quality, F2.4 aperture makes your images clearer, and Night Mode allows you to no longer afraid of super low light conditions.

🔮 Using Night mode on the Note 10 is simply -- select it as a shooting mode in the camera app, and then make sure to hold your phone really steady while it captures the photos. Night mode uses the limited amount of light available in a scene and amplifies it to create a well-lit photo where one typically wouldn't be possible. You do need some light in order for Night mode to work.
descriptionShort: 🎨 Professional camera of Note 10 set turns all photos&videos into vivid moments

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Crash fixes from the previous version on some devices
- Improve stability, minor bug fixes
